node.title: Lockdown forces woman to stay at blind date's house for a week
node.description: The woman was visiting the city to meet ten matches when her fifth date turned into a weeklong stay.
node.content: ["A woman in China has gone viral after a blind date turned into a weeklong stay at her dates house after the city she was visiting was thrown into lockdown.", "The woman, who wanted to be identified by her last name Wang, went for a week-long trip to the Chinese city of Zhengzhou to find love.", "The Daily Mail reported Wang made the trip to meet with ten matches that her family had set up.", "Wang was having dinner with her fifth blind date after he invited her to his house to 'show off his cooking skills,' when they were unexpectedly thrown into lockdown.\u00a0", "\"Just after I arrived in Zhengzhou, there was an outbreak and his community was put under lockdown and I could not leave.\"", "According to reports in China, love didn't blossom over Wang's weeklong stay. Describing the date as 'mute as a wooden mannequin'.", "Wang shared her extended date experience on social media, posting videos documenting life in lockdown with her date.", "\"Besides the fact he's as mute as a wooden mannequin, everything else is pretty good.\"", "But it turned out his cooking skills weren't up to Wang's standards.\u00a0", "\"Despite his food being mediocre, he still willing to cook, which I think is great.\"", "Wang's home documentaries soon went viral on Chinese social media, prompting Wang to remove them.\u00a0", "\"Friends have been calling him and I think as definitely think this has affected his life. So I have taken them down for now.\"", "Wang said in a video posted to social media that she hopes her single sisters also find a relationship too, thanking everyone for the attention.", "The Daily Mail reports that it is still unclear whether or not Wang is still stuck at her date's house.\u00a0"]
